summary: A test suite that validates the YOLOS image processing pipeline, covering configuration handling, annotation batching for detection and panoptic COCO formats, interaction with PyTorch models, resizing constraints, padding behavior, and property exposure.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the YOLOS preprocessing components so that computerâ€‘vision models can be trained and deployed with confidence in handling diverse annotation types and image transformations.
